title: Kerala Crime Files Season 2
overview: Set in 2024, the second season follows SI Noble, who is newly assigned to a remote police station in rural Thiruvananthapuram. He was accompanied by Circle Inspector Kurian Avaran and team. His first case takes a mysterious turn when a civil police officer, Ambili Raju, suddenly goes missing shortly after being transferred under suspicious circumstances linked to his questionable associations. As Noble investigates further, the case widens in scope, uncovering secrets about Ambili's behaviour towards public and his hold. The series unravels the mystery behind Ambili Rajuâ€™s disappearance while highlighting how Noble and his team navigate through layers of hidden truths to bring justice.
